summary: Feature request to update the TypeScript SDK's AI SDK integration to support v6, as per Vercel's AI SDK 6 release.
userImpact: Users leveraging the AI SDK integration will benefit from the latest v6 features and improvements.
proposedFix: Update the AI SDK integration to v6 following Vercel's release announcement.
resolutionDetails: Resolved by PR #1865 which implements the AI SDK v6 update.
keyQuote: Update AI SDK integration to v6
